original_title: Man shot dead by motorcycle gunmen in Ambalangoda
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 42-year-old man was shot dead in Kuligoda, Ambalangoda on Tuesday (28) morning.

Police Spokesperson SSP Nihal Thalduwa told News 1st that the suspects who carried out the shooting had targeted the man who was traveling on a motorcycle. Police suspect that the shooters may have used a motorcycle for their getaway.

The injured man was rushed to the Ambalangoda Hospital, and died shortly after. An investigation is underway, and preliminary investigations revealed that a T56 Assault Rifle had been used to carry out the shooting.
